about_the_game:
BUNNY-HOP propels you into an action-packed 3D platforming realm demanding sharp reflexes and swift decisions. Zoom through meticulously designed levels at breakneck speed, navigate evolving obstacles, or take a moment to revel in the vibrant landscapes we've crafted. Each level unfurls a distinct style and challenge, ensuring a continually engaging and exhilarating adventure.


  • Pulse-pounding high-speed 3D platforming action
  • Masterful bunny hopping mechanics for skillful movement
  • Meticulously crafted levels, each a unique adrenaline rush
  • Dynamic obstacles demanding split-second reflexes
  • Competitive leaderboards to ignite your speedrunning spirit
  • Vivid, eye-catching visuals bringing each level to life
  • Thriving community with player rankings fueling friendly rivalry
  • Passionate indie creation from the dedicated Harpoon Studios team


So come and join BUNNY-HOP, where precision jumps, lightning-fast speed, and stunning graphics come together to give you a one-of-a-kind platformer experience.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x64 Distro
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1000 Series or Intel equivalent
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 11 Support
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x64 Distro
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600 or Intel equivalent
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 12 Support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: M1 or Intel/AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or Intel/AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: M1 Pro or Intel/AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 Pro or Intel/AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: BUNNY-HOP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1000 Series or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 11 Support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 12 Support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Unleash speed and skill in BUNNY-HOP. Dash through diverse levels, tackle dynamic obstacles, and top the leaderboards. Master bunny hopping and experience high-speed gameplay in this pulse-pounding adventure by Harpoon Studios.
